index.header: Apply for a refugee integration loan
index.text1: If you are a refugee or have been given humanitarian protection, you might be able to apply for a loan of up to £1000 to help you integrate into UK society.
index.text2: To apply, you will need your:
index.bullet2: bank account or ASPEN card details
index.getHelpText1: Your local refugee community organisation can help you with your application and filling in the form.
index.getHelpText2: You can also contact the integration loan team:

joint.header: Are you applying for a joint loan with your partner?

declaration.text1: By submitting this application, you agree that:
declaration.bullet1: the information is correct and complete as far as you know
declaration.bullet2: you will use the loan for its intended purpose

confirmation.text1: We’ll contact you with the outcome of your application or if we need further information from you.
confirmation.text2: If you have been sucessful, you will be sent a loan agreement which you will have accept before receiving your loan.
confirmation.text3: If you have been unsucessful, we will write to you explaining the reasons for this decision.
